attributes.action: Require all new housing to incorporate Solar Panels/Wind Generators and other green energy supplies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thousands of new houses are being built on land in the UK and there is currently no requirement for them to be fuelled by renewable energy sources.
We would like to see the building laws changed to force all new houses to incorporate solar panels, wind generators and other sources of renewable energy. Make it law so that it really makes a dfference.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
